name: Integer Guessing
description:
Integer Guessing (or Guess the number) is a game made by me if you want to spend some time. You guess a number between 1 and 10 and see if your right.

Basic Instructions:

Input a number between 1 and 10. Don't try to put any numbers higher then 10 because it'll prevent you from doing so.

Cross your fingers that you got it right. You have 5 guesses and then the text that tells you that you got it wrong disappears, which means that the number has been reset.

(Developer's Note) A playable exe will be made soon!
